name: PAT_ENC_LETTERS
description: The patient encounter letters table contains information about letters associated with encounters.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count used to identify different letters associated with an encounter.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: LTR_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value associated with the status of each letter,  such as 1- Open, 2- Deleted, 3- Sent, 4- Voided, 5-Sent by batch.

columns.name: LETTER_CREAT_DT
columns.description: The date that the letter was created.

columns.name: LETTER_HNO_ID
columns.description: The note (HNO) record that hold the letter text.

columns.name: LETTER_FROM_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the user entered as the "from" user in the letter activity.

columns.name: LETTER_FROM_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LETTER_ROUT_CMT_ID
columns.description: The note (HNO) ID that holds the letter routing comments.

columns.name: LETTER_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value associated with the reason for the letter.

columns.name: LETTER_REASON_CMT
columns.description: The comment for the letter reason.

columns.name: LTR_STATUS_CHG_TM
columns.description: The instant (date and time) the status of the letter was created or changed.

columns.name: LTR_STAT_CH_USR_ID
columns.description: The user that changed or created the letter status.

columns.name: LTR_STAT_CH_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LETTER_DELVRY_ADDR
columns.description: The address the letter was sent to.

columns.name: LETTER_RETURN_ADDR
columns.description: The return address for the letter

columns.name: LETTER_WORKINGDAYS
columns.description: The number of work days (excluding weekends and holidays) from the date of the letter's encounter to the date the letter was sent.
